Description: When damaged, this card only takes half the damage, rounded down.

Description: Before being struck, this card moves to an adjacent space and leaves "TOKEN" behind.

Name: Wild Reshape
Description: During your draw step, this card turns into your deck's top card.

Name: Darwin Theory
Description: During your end step, this card turns into your deck's top card.

Name: Infection
Description: During your draw step, this card turns into a random Polyp card.

Name: Infestation
Description: During your end step, this card turns into a common Polyp card.

Name: Finical Hatchling
Description: If your deck contains 5 different values for both health and power, and 5 different tribes, this card turns into a "Hydra".

Name: Transformer
Description: During your draw step, this card changes form.

Name: Ritual
Description: [{mark:sacrifice}Sacrifice another card] This card changes form.

Name: B34st Tamer
Description: You may trigger the {sigil:Transformer} Transformer sigils of your cards at will.

Name: Frozen Away
Description: When damaged, if this card perishes, a "TOKEN" is placed in its space.

Name: Ambush
Description: When this card dies, a "TOKEN" is placed on your side.

Name: Exploding Corpse
Description: When damaged, if this card perishes, "TOKEN" are placed in all empty spaces on your side.

Name: Ruby Heart
Description: When this card dies, a "Ruby Mox" is placed in its place.

Name: Soul Driven
Description: When this card dies, an "Altar of Citrine" is placed in its place.

Name: Gestation Tank
Description: When this card dies, a "Vat Creature" is placed in its place. Its form depends on the number of turns this card was on the field.

Name: Imprison
Description: When played, choose another card you control and discard it. When this card dies, place it in its space.

Name: Resurrect
Description: When this card dies, search a card from your discard and place it in this space.

Name: Corpse Eater
Description: When a card you control perishes, if this card is in your hand, it is placed it in its space.

Name: Parasite
Description: When a card you control perishes, if this card is in your hand, you may place it in its space.

Name: Apparition
Description: You may play this card for free from your deck or hand by saying its name 3 consecutive times. You then take up to 8 non-lethal direct damage.

Name: Legion
Description: When played, search a common card from your discard and place it on your side for free.

Name: Army
Description: When played, search a card from your discard and place it on your side.

Name: Summon
Description: When played, up to 2 "TOKEN" cards are placed in adjacent spaces.

Name: Invoke
Description: When played, "TOKEN" cards are placed in all your empty spaces.

Name: Regurgitate
Description: When played, a card from your side deck is placed in adjacent spaces.

Name: Vomiting
Description: When played, a card from your side deck is placed in all your empty spaces.

Name: Swarm
Description: When played, 2 copies of this card are placed in adjacent spaces. Copies lose this sigil.

Name: Invasion
Description: When played, copies of this card are placed in all your empty spaces. Copies lose this sigil.

Name: Bomb Spewer
Description: When played, an "Explode Bot" is placed into every single empty space. This card ignores {sigil:Detonator} Detonator.

Name: Squirrel Shedder
Description: During your end step, this card moves to an adjacent space and leaves a "Squirrel" behind.

Name: Squirrel Trail
Description: During your end step, this card moves to an adjacent space, pushing other cards in its way, and leaves a "Squirrel" behind.

Name: Production Line
Description: During your end step, this card moves to an adjacent space and leaves a "Homunculus" behind.

Name: Factory Line
Description: During your end step, this card moves to an adjacent space, pushing other cards in its way, and leaves a "Homunculus" behind.

Name: Noxious Trail
Description: During your end step, this card moves to an adjacent space and leaves "Toxic Fumes" behind if you pay its cost.

Name: Noxious Dropper
Description: During your end step, this card moves to an adjacent space, pushing other cards in its way, and leaves "Toxic Fumes" behind if you pay its cost.

Name: Paper Trail
Description: During your end step, this card moves to an adjacent space and leaves a "Paper Pile" behind.

Name: Paper Dropper
Description: During your end step, this card moves to an adjacent space, pushing other cards in its way, and leaves a "Paper Pile" behind.

Name: Caustic Trail
Description: During your end step, this card moves to an adjacent space and leaves "Toxic Sludge" behind if you pay its cost.

Name: Caustic Dropper
Description: During your end step, this card moves to an adjacent space, pushing other cards in its way, and leaves "Toxic Sludge" behind if you pay its cost.

Name: Skeleton Crew
Description: During your end step, this card moves to an adjacent space and leaves a "Skeleton" behind.

Name: Skeleton Legion
Description: During your end step, this card moves to an adjacent space, pushing other cards in its way, then leaves a "Skeleton" behind.

Name: Spirit Spread
Description: During your end step, this card moves to an adjacent space and leaves a random Spectre behind.

Name: Spirit Weaver
Description: During your end step, this card moves to an adjacent space, pushing other cards in its way, then leaves a random Spectre behind.

Name: Pylon Carver
Description: During your end step, this card moves to an adjacent space and leaves a "Pylon" behind.

Name: Pylon Weaver
Description: During your end step, this card moves to an adjacent space, pushing other cards in its way, and leaves a "Pylon" behind.

Name: Leep Legion
Description: During your end step, this card moves to an adjacent space and leaves a random Leep card behind.

Name: Leep Friend
Description: During your end step, this card moves to an adjacent space, pushing other cards in its way, and leaves a random Leep card behind.

Name: Mox Dropper
Description: During your end step, this card moves to an adjacent space and leaves a random Side deck Mox card behind.

Name: Mox Shedder
Description: During your end step, this card moves to an adjacent space, pushing other cards in its way and leaves a random Side deck Mox card behind.

Name: Frog Friend
Description: During your end step, this card moves to an adjacent space and leaves a random Frog card behind.

Name: Frog Crew
Description: During your end step, this card moves to an adjacent space, pushing other cards in its way, and leaves a random Frog card behind.

Name: Wire Weaver
Description: During your end step, this card moves to an adjacent space and leaves a "Null Conduit" behind.

Name: Wire Carver
Description: During your end step, this card moves to an adjacent space, pushing other cards in its way, and leaves a "Null Conduit" behind.

Name: Spine Walker
Description: During your end step, this card moves to an adjacent space and leaves a "Vertebrae" behind.

Name: Transmogutate
Description: [Once per turn, {mark:sacrifice}sacrifice a card] Place a Side Deck Mox card of your choice in its place.

Name: Gift Bearer
Description: When this card dies, draw a card from your deck.

Name: Generosity Bearer
Description: When this card dies, draw two cards from your deck.

Name: Gem Bearer
Description: When this card dies, draw a random Side deck Mox card.

Name: Gem Generosity
Description: When this card dies, draw two random Side deck Mox cards.

Name: Gem Greed
Description: When your other Mox cards perish, draw a card from your deck.

Name: Gem Greedier
Description: When your other Mox cards perish, draw 2 cards from your deck.

Name: Greed
Description: [{mark:sacrifice}Sacrifice this card] Draw one random side deck mox card per mox card on your field.

Name: Polyp Harvest
Description: When your Polyp cards perish, draw a card from your deck.

Name: Go Fetch
Description: When your Canine cards perish, draw a card from your deck.

Name: Search Dogs
Description: When your Canine cards perish, draw 2 cards from your deck.

Name: Fish Bearer
Description: When this card perishes, draw a random Fish card.

Name: Infinite Knowledge
Description: When your other cards are killed in combat, draw a card from your deck.

Name: Loaded
Description: When this card dies, draw 3 cards from your deck and 1 card from your side deck.

Name: Stuffed
Description: When this card dies, draw 4 cards from your deck and 2 cards from your side deck.

Name: Mental Gemnastics
Description: When played, draw a card from your deck for each Mox card you control.

Name: Mental Acrobatics
Description: When played, for each mox card you control, draw 2 cards from your deck and return 1.

Name: Unearthed Pack
Description: When played, shuffle your discard and draw 2 of the top 5 cards.

Name: Handy
Description: When played, discard your hand and draw the same amount of cards from your deck, and 2 from your side deck.

Name: Watchman
Description: When a card enters the opposing space, draw a card from your deck.

Name: Looter
Description: Draw a card from your deck for each direct damage this card deals.

Name: Pillager
Description: Draw 2 cards from your deck for each direct damage this card deals.

Name: Side Hustle
Description: Draw a card from your side deck for each direct damage this card deals.

Name: Predator
Description: Draw 2 cards from your side deck for each direct damage this card deals.

Name: Firey Rummage
Description: Discard a card from your hand to draw a card from your deck.

Name: True Scholar
Description: [Once per turn, {mark:shatter}shatter a card] Draw 2 cards from your deck.

Name: Bees Within
Description: When damaged, draw a "Bee".

Name: Full of Bees
Description: When damaged, draw two "Bees".

Name: Termites Within
Description: When damaged, draw a "Termite".

Name: Full of Termites
Description: When damaged, draw two "Termites".

Name: Skull Summoner
Description: When damaged, draw a "Skeleton".

Name: Skull Maker
Description: When damaged, draw 2 "Skeletons".

Name: Ants Within
Description: When damaged, draw a random Ant card.

Name: Full of Ants
Description: When damaged, draw 2 random Ant cards.

Name: Geode
Description: When damaged, draw a random side deck mox card.

Name: Mineral
Description: When damaged, draw 2 random side deck mox cards.

Name: Vessel Printer
Description: When damaged, draw a card from your side deck.

Name: Vessel Factory
Description: When damaged, draw 2 cards from your side deck.

Name: Rabbit Hole
Description: When played, draw a "TOKEN".

Name: Rabbit Chasm
Description: When played, draw two "TOKEN".

Name: Ash Tray
Description: When played, draw "The Smoke".

Name: Puppeteer
Description: When played, draw an "Umbral Servant". It may be placed next to this card for free.

Name: Ant Spawner
Description: When played, draw a common Ant card of your choice.

Name: Ant Swarm
Description: When played, draw two random Ant cards of your choice.

Name: Fecundity
Description: When played, draw a copy of this card. The copy loses this sigil.

Name: Cloning
Description: When played, draw two copies of this card. Copies lose this sigil.

Name: Imitation Art
Description: When played, draw a copy of another card you control.

Name: Sludge Art
Description: When played, draw a copy of another card you control and of an opposing card.

Name: Chew Toy
Description: When played, draw a random Hound card. The cost of Hound cards is halved.

Name: Mech Builder
Description: When played, draw a Mechabeast card of your choice.

Name: Psychic Link
Description: When played, draw a "Squidling".

Name: Fragile Construct
Description: When played, search a {mark:brittle} Brittle card from your deck or discard, or draw a "Skeleton".

Name: Re-Index
Description: When played, search a common card from your deck costing up to 6{mark_x}{resource:energy} energy and another from your discard.

Name: Restore
Description: When played, search an {resource:energy} energy costing common card from your deck and another from your discard.

Name: Hoarder
Description: When played, search a common card from your deck.

Name: Collector
Description: When played, search a card from your deck.

Name: Horde
Description: When this card kills another, place a "TOKEN" on your side.

Name: Hotfix
Description: When your side deck cards die, they return to your hand instead.

Name: Disentomb
Description: [Pay {resource:bone}{resource:bone}] Search a {mark:brittle} Brittle card from any of your decks.

Name: Cybernetics
Description: [Pay 4{mark:x}{resource:energy}] Place a "Cyborg" or a "Flyborg" on your field.

Name: Print Process
Description: [Pay {resource:max_energy}{resource:max_energy}] Draw a card from your deck.

Name: Printing Press
Description: [Pay 2 metal] Draw a card from your deck.

Name: Reanimate
Description: [Once per turn] Pay for and play a common card from your discard.

Name: Equivalent Exchange
Description: [Once per turn] exchange a card from your hand with one it shares a tribe with from your discard pile.

Name: Colony
Description: This card's power is the number of Ant cards you control.

Name: Pylon Powered
Description: This card's power is the number of Pylon cards you control.

Name: Burden Power
Description: This card's power is the number of Pelt cards you control, including itself.

Name: Loner
Description: This card's power is the number of empty spaces on your side of the field.

Name: Strong Hand
Description: This card's power is the size of your hand, up to 5.

Name: Spilt Blood
Description: This card's power is the amount of blood you made this turn, up to 5.

Name: Scattered Bones
Description: This card's power is half the number of bones you own, rounded down and up to 5.

Name: Catacomb
Description: This card's power is the number of bones you own, up to 5.

Name: Grim Power
Description: When another card perishes, this card gains 1 power, up to 5.

Name: Overclock
Description: This card's power is half your amount of unspent energy, rounded down.

Name: Gem Power
Description: This card's power is the number of Mox cards you control.

Name: Flesh Power
Description: This card's power is the number of Flesh chemicals you own, up to 5.

Name: Dice Power
Description: When played, roll a d6. This card's power is the result.

Name: Facsimile
Description: This card's power is the opposing card's power.

Name: traeH Power
Description: This card's power is the opposing card's health.

Name: Health Power
Description: This card's power is this card's health.

Name: Scale Power
Description: This card's power is dependent on how tipped in your favour the scales are.

Name: Item Power
Description: This card's power is the number of items you own.

Name: Overcharge
Description: For every {resource:energy} energy cell you would gain when already at 12, this card gains 1 power, up to 7.

Name: Raging Flames
Description: During your end step, this card loses 1 health and gains 1 power.

Name: Bell Ringer
Description: This card's power is the number of times the bell was rung since it was played, up to 5.

Name: Bloodlust
Description: When this card kills another, it gains 1 power, up to 5.

Name: Bloodshed
Description: When this card damages another, it gains 1 power, up to 5.

Name: Resentful
Description: When damaged, this card gains 1 power, up to 5.

Name: Sensitive
Description: When damaged or when its space is struck directly, this card gains 1 power, up to 5.

Name: Dust Power
Description: When your Mox cards die, this card gains 1 power, up to 5.

Name: Dooming Dust
Description: [Once per turn, {mark:shatter}shatter a card] Another card has 2 more power until your end step.

Name: Stimulate
Description: [Once per turn, pay {resource:energy}{resource:energy}{resource:energy}] This card gains 1 power, up to 5.

Name: Power Dice
Description: [Pay {resource:energy}{resource:energy}{resource:energy}] Roll a D6, the result becomes this card's base power until your end step.

Name: Infinifold
Description: [Once per turn, {mark:shatter}shatter a card] This card's power is doubled.

Name: Expertise
Description: Any stat increase applied to this card is doubled.

Name: Mastery
Description: Any stat increase applied to this card is tripled.

Name: Leader
Description: Adjacent cards have 1 more power.

Name: Commander
Description: Adjacent cards have 2 more power.

Name: Sea Shanty
Description: Your {mark:brittle} Brittle cards have 1 more power.

Name: Treasure Hunt
Description: Your {mark:brittle} Brittle cards have 2 more power.

Name: Haunted Stonework
Description: During your end step, draw a {sigil:MadeofStone} Made of Stone terrain card. Your {sigil:MadeofStone} Made of Stone cards have 1 more power.

Name: Stone Spirit
Description: During your end step, draw a {sigil:MadeofStone} Made of Stone terrain card. Your {sigil:MadeofStone} Made of Stone cards have 2 more power.

Name: Truest Patron
Description: Cards you control with a negative sigil have 1 more power.

Name: Witching Hour
Description: Your other Spectre cards have 1 more power.

Name: Blood Moon
Description: Your other Spectre cards have 2 more power.

Name: Leep Leader
Description: Your other Leep cards have 1 more power.

Name: Leep Commander
Description: Your other Leep cards have 2 more power.

Name: Gem Animator
Description: Your other Mox cards have 1 more power.

Name: Gem Empowerer
Description: Your other Mox cards have 2 more power.

Name: Enhanced Pylons
Description: Your pylon cards have 1 more power.

Name: Empowered Pylons
Description: Your pylon cards have 2 more power.

Name: Psychic Spores
Description: Your other Polyp cards have 1 more power.

Name: Mental Spores
Description: Your other Polyp cards have 2 more power.

Name: Psionic Guidance
Description: Your other Ceremorph cards have 1 more power.

Name: Psionic Control
Description: Your other Ceremorph cards have 2 more power.

Name: Curse
Description: Your other Ancient cards have 1 more power.

Name: Malediction
Description: Your other Ancient cards have 2 more power.

Name: Offense Upgrade
Description: Your cards with 1 base power have 1 more power.

Name: Extreme Offense
Description: Your cards with 0 to 1 base power have 1 more power.

Name: Cheerful
Description: Your Side deck cards have 1 more power.

Name: Ecstatic
Description: Your Side deck cards have 2 more power.

Name: Numerology
Description: Your Cards with a number in their name have 1 more power.

Name: Unholy Will
Description: Your other cards have 1 more power.

Name: August Aura
Description: Your other cards have 2 more power.

Name: Regal Presence
Description: Your other cards have 4 more power.

Name: Whimsical Leader
Description: During your end step, a card of your choice gains 1 power, up to 5.

Name: Empower
Description: During your end step, a card of your choice gains 1 power.

Name: Soul Strike
Description: When this card dies, a Mox card you control gains 1 power and strikes its opposing space.

Name: Soul Assault
Description: When this card dies, a Mox card you control gains 1 power and strikes an opposing space of your choice.

Name: Sparkling Dust
Description: [{mark:shatter}Shatter a card] Deal its health worth of damage to any other card.

Name: Arcane Blessing
Description: [Once per turn, discard a card from your hand or field] A card of your choice gains 1 power, up to 5.

Name: Turbocharge
Description: [Pay {resource:energy}{resource:energy}{resource:energy}] Add {sigil:Overclocked} Overclock to a card that does not have it.

Name: Convalesce
Description: During your end step, this card gains 1 health, up to 5.

Name: Gemagnify
Description: During your end step, this card gains 1 health per mox card you control, up to 5.

Name: Gem Healing
Description: During your end step, this card gains 1 health per mox card you control.

Name: Reinforce
Description: During your end step, one of your other cards gains 1 health, up to its base health.

Name: Healthcare
Description: During your end step, heal one of your other cards up to its base health.

Name: Whimsical Healer
Description: During your end step, a card of your choice gains 1 health, up to 5.

Name: Health Boost
Description: During your end step, a card of your choice gains health equal to this card's health, up to 5.

Name: Eternal Life
Description: During your end step, your other cards gain 1 health, up to 5.

Name: Bloodsucker
Description: When this card damages another, it gains 1 health, up to 5.

Name: Bloodguzzler
Description: When this card damages another, it gains health equal to the damage taken, up to 5.

Name: Heart of Dust
Description: When your Mox cards die, this card gains 1 health, up to 5.

Name: Assimilator
Description: During your end step, adjacent cards perish. Add their health to this card.

Name: Assembly
Description: During your end step, adjacent cards perish. Their sigils replace this card's other sigils.

Name: Enlarge
Description: [Pay {resource:bone}{resource:bone}] This card gains 1 power and health, up to 5.

Name: Invigorate
Description: [Once per turn, {mark:sacrifice}Sacrifice a card] A card you control gains 1 power and health, up to 5.

Name: Absorption
Description: [{mark:sacrifice}Sacrifice a card] This card gain 2 health, up to 5.

Name: Swapper
Description: When struck, swap this card's power and health.

Name: Swap
Description: Swap this card's power and health.

Name: Morsel
Description: When {mark:sacrifice}sacrificed, this card's stats are added to the card it was sacrificed to.

Name: Delightful
Description: When {mark:sacrifice}sacrificed, this card's stats are added to the card it was sacrificed to, which also gains 1 power and health.

Name: Biotic Needles
Description: [Pay 2 elixir] Any other card gains 1 power, up to 5. [Pay 2 flesh] Any other card gains 2 health, up to 5.

Name: Medicine
Description: [Pay 2 elixir] Adjacent cards have 1 more power. [Pay 2 flesh] Adjacent cards have 2 more health.

Name: Dust Fueled
Description: When your Mox cards die, this card gains 1 power and health, up to 5.

Name: Envious
Description: When your cards gain power or health, this card gains it instead, with no maximum power or health.

Name: Recall the Broken
Description: When your cards perish due to {mark:brittle} Brittle, they return to your hand.

Name: Recycled Pylons
Description: When your Pylon cards perish, they are returned to your hand.

Name: Haunter
Description: After this card dies, the next card to enter its space gains its other sigils.

Name: Possessor
Description: After this card dies, the next card to enter its space gains its other sigils, as well as {sigil:Haunter} Haunter.

Name: Gem Persistance
Description: When a side deck mox card you control dies, the next card to enter its space gains its sigils.

Name: Spiritual Persistance
Description: When played, another card gains {sigil:Haunter} Haunter.

Name: Haunting Presence
Description: When played, all your other cards gain {sigil:Haunter} Haunter.

Name: Inscrybe
Description: When playing a card, it gains one sigil from the cards you {mark:sacrifice}sacrifice.

Name: Terrain
Description: A card may enter this card's space. It gains all its other sigils, and this card is discarded.

Name: Blank Copy
Description: When played, this card copies a sigil from a card you control.

Name: Download
Description: When played, this card copies a sigil from any card on the board.

Name: Splash of Color
Description: When played, choose 2 cards. They gain each other's sigils.

Name: Stinky
Description: The opposing card has 1 less power.

Name: Stench
Description: The opposing card has 2 less power.

Name: Gooey
Description: When struck, the card that struck this one loses 1 power.

Name: Slimy
Description: When struck, the card that struck this one loses 2 power.

Name: Web Shooter
Description: When killed, the card that killed this card cannot attack next turn.

Name: Cobwebs
Description: Any card that kills your cards won't be able to attack next turn.

Name: Wrangler
Description: When this card damages another, that card cannot attack next turn.

Name: Purist
Description: The opposing card is treated as having no sigils or marks.

Name: Paralyzing
Description: The opposing card is treated as having no sigils or marks, and has 0 power.

Name: Ancient Presence
Description: All non-side deck opposing cards are treated as having no sigils or marks.

Name: Spotlight
Description: The opposing space has a {mark:target} Target mark.

Name: Surveillance Network
Description: [Once per turn] Place a {mark:target} Target mark on any opposing space until your draw step.

Name: Null Conduit
Description: This card counts as a Conduit card.

Name: Pure Conduit
Description: Cards between this and another Conduit card nullify the sigils of their opposing card.

Name: Attack Conduit
Description: Cards between this and another Conduit card have 1 more power.

Name: Power Conduit
Description: Cards between this and another Conduit card have 2 more power.

Name: Aim Conduit
Description: Cards between this and another Conduit card may target any opposing space when they strike.

Name: Overclock Conduit
Description: Cards between this and another Conduit card have 2 more power, but you take 2 damage when they perish.

Name: Turret Conduit
Description: When a card enters the opposing space of your Conduit cards or of cards between them, it is dealt 1 damage.

Name: Heal Conduit
Description: During your end step, cards between this and another Conduit card gain 1 health, up to 5.

Name: Soul Conduit
Description: During your end step, your Conduit cards and cards between them gain 1 health, up to 5.

Name: Armor Conduit
Description: During your end step, cards between this and another Conduit card gain an {mark:armor} Armor mark.

Name: Nano Conduit
Description: During your end step, your Conduit cards and cards between them gain an {mark:armor} Armor mark.

Name: Spawn Conduit
Description: During your end step, a card costing 0-3{mark:x}{resource:energy} energy is searched and placed between this and another Conduit card.

Name: Production Conduit
Description: During your end step, search cards costing up to 3 energy and place them in every empty space between this and another Conduit card.

Name: Gem Spawn Conduit
Description: During your end step, a random Gem Vessel is placed between this and another Conduit card.

Name: Energy Conduit
Description: While you control another Conduit card, your {resource:energy_empty} energy cells refill.

Name: Gem Conduit
Description: Cards between this and another Conduit card are gemified.

Name: Eldritch Conduit
Description: During your draw step, you may set one chemical's value per card between this and another Conduit card.

Name: Activation Conduit
Description: Cards played between this and another Conduit card trigger their activated ability once for free.

Name: Spam Conduit
Description: Cards played between this and another Conduit card trigger their activated ability twice for free.

Name: Conduit Relay
Description: If you control another Conduit card, all your other cards are considered to be between them.

Name: Radiowave
Description: The card you control with the most spaces between it and this card counts as a Conduit card.

Name: Powered
Description: This card always counts as being between two Conduit cards.

Name: Capacitor
Description: Adjacent cards count as being between two Conduit cards.

Name: Gem Cable
Description: Your Mox cards also count as Conduit cards, and vice versa.

Name: Energizer
Description: All your cards count as being between two Conduit cards.

Name: Circuit Buff
Description: If this card is between two Conduit cards, it has 2 more power.

Name: Circuit Rage
Description: If this card is between two Conduit cards, it has 4 more power.

Name: Fuse Cover
Description: Strikes targeting Conduit cards you control are redirected to this card.

Name: Breaker
Description: Your conduit cards cannot be struck.

Name: Enhanced Arcane
Description: If you provide 2 unique mox colors, this card has 1 more power.

Name: Empowered Arcane
Description: If you provide 2 unique mox colors, this card has 2 more power.

Name: Pack Mentality
Description: If this card shares a tribe with another card you control, it has 2 more power.

Name: Marrow Catalyst
Description: Your cards cost 2{mark:x}{resource:bone} bones less to play.

Name: Night of the Living Dead
Description: The cost of your cards is reduced by 2{mark:x}{resource:bone} bones and 2{mark:x}{resource:energy} energy.

Name: Full Moon Night
Description: Your cards cost half their normal amount of {resource:bone} bones and {resource:energy} energy to play.

Name: Unseelie Authority
Description: When a non-Spectre card you control perishes, a 0-power Spectre card is placed in its place.

Name: Puppet Master
Description: Your {mark:brittle} cards ignore its effect, but perish when this card dies.

Name: Illusionist
Description: Your cards ignore {mark:brittle} Brittle.

Name: Mental Fortitude
Description: Your cards ignore {sigil:GemDependent} and {sigil:Familiar} if there are at least 2 cards in your hand.

Name: Mental Mastery
Description: Your cards ignore {sigil:GemDependent} and {sigil:Familiar} if your hand is not empty.

Name: Trinket Bearer
Description: When played, gain a random item.

Name: Aligning Stars
Description: When played, gain a random boon.

Name: Lunar Dealer
Description: When played, gain a random item and a random boon.

Name: All-Sight
Description: During your draw step, look at the top card of one of your decks.

Name: Foresight
Description: During your draw step, look at the top card of one of your decks. You may then shuffle that deck.

Name: Cull Out
Description: When played, draw a card from your deck, then shuffle another card from your hand into your deck.

Name: Grim Call
Description: When played, draw a card from your deck. Unless you play it, it will be discarded when you ring the bell.

Name: Grim Gift
Description: When played, draw 2 cards from your deck. Unless you play them, they will be discarded when you ring the bell.

Name: Divination
Description: When played, look at and rearrange the top 3 cards on your deck.

Name: Occult
Description: When played, look at and rearrange the cards in your deck. Your deck is shuffled when this card dies.

Name: Prophecy
Description: When you would draw an unspecified card from your deck, search a card from your deck instead.

Name: Event Horizon
Description: When played, swap another card on your field with one from your hand.

Name: Tackle
Description: When played, the opposing card is sent back to its owner's hand.

Name: Fling
Description: When played, the opposing card is sent to any space in the back lane.

Name: Amorphous
Description: This card is treated as having the opposing card's sigils.

Name: Mimic
Description: When played, this card copies the sigils of any opposing card.

Name: Undefined
Description: Choose an opposing card to mimic the sigils of.

Name: Vicious Mockery
Description: If this card is played opposing a card, it mimics its stats and sigils.

Name: Sigil Eater
Description: When this card kills another, that card's sigils replaces all sigils on this card, except for this one.

Name: Sigil Devourer
Description: When this card kills another, it gains that card's sigils.

Name: Transformation
Description: This card gains up to 3 sigils from the cards {mark:sacrifice}sacrificed to play it.

Name: Resonance
Description: When played, this card immediately triggers one of its other sigils.

Name: Reaction Replica
Description: When you play a card, it gets played a second time.

Name: Reaction Duplicata
Description: When you play a card, it gets played two more times.

Name: Double Death
Description: When your cards die, they perish 1 more time.

Name: Triple Death
Description: When your cards die, they perish 2 more times.

Name: Arcane Echo
Description: Activated abilities trigger twice when triggered.

Name: Arcane Recursion
Description: Activated abilities trigger three times when triggered.

Name: Time Loop
Description: Your end step triggers an additional time.

Name: Illusion Dust
Description: During your end step, this card makes your other cards believe it is a Mox card being {mark:shatter}shattered.

Name: Pay Tribute
Description: [{mark:sacrifice}Sacrifice a card] The card perishes, gain {resource:bone} bones equal to its base health and this card gains 1 power.

Name: Burden
Description: This card can only be removed from your deck by exchanging it.

Name: Grim Epitaph
Description: When played, search a card from your discard and place it on your field.

Name: Particle Scan
Description: When played, a copy of an opposing card is placed on your field.

Name: Magickal Bleach
Description: When played, choose any card on the field. It will lose its sigils.

Name: Imposture
Description: This card is set aside from your main deck. It will reveal itself in battles.

Name: The Golden Ram
Description: When killed in combat, a Golden Pelt is permanently added to your deck.

Name: I Doth Decree
Description: Your cards have no maximum power or health.

Name: Swift Play
Description: This card can only be played during any step of your opponent's turn.

Name: Omniplay
Description: This card can be played at any step during either turn.

Name: Steal
Description: When killed in combat, your opponent loses 2 {resource:bone} bones.

Name: Eluhvbem
